ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Create Users
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Create Users
ActivityMetadata.Description: A Zoom account can have one or more users. Use this API to add a new user to your account. **Scopes:** `user:write:admin` `user:write`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Create Users

A Zoom account can have one or more users. Use this API to add a new user to your account. **Scopes:** `user:write:admin` `user:write`

Method: Post

OperationID: userCreate

EndPoint:

/users
